title: The Best Omurice
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Ahhh, I accidentally ripped the egg again...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Don’t worry about it, it’s fine. Let me see that~ ...There.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Wow!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>See~? Even if it’s a little torn, as long as you put the rice on it nicely, it’ll be fine~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I see… But it’s nowhere near as nice as the omurice you make, Kanata-san... I wonder if I could do that if I practiced...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Of course you can. With how good at cooking you are, I’m sure it’ll be nice and easy for you once you get the hang of it ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I’ll do my best! I’ll make the best omurice for Honoka-chan and Umi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>If that’s your goal, then you’ve already done it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>After all, you’ve poured all your thoughts and feelings for those two into it. That’s the secret ingredient to making the best dishes~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
